title: Spacious 2 Bedroom steps from the lake
posting_body: Lovely and spacious 2 bedroom apt a block from the lake and walking distance to bart, restaurants, shops etc.
Second floor walk up in 3 story building, freshly painted, wooden floors, all new windows.
There is a standard bedroom and another light filled room that can be used as a bedroom or anything else.
If available there is a detached garage behind electronic gate at additional monthly fee.
Quiet bldg, long term residents, looking for same.
Photos don't show this living space to best advantage.
